data.fullContent: The container delivery business is booming, which means the demand is higher than the supply. There are a lot of factors to consider when one decides to deliver a container load of materials, such as what type of container is needed, how the materials are going to be moved, how the materials will be distributed, will they be sorted and how, etc. The context will determine the number of containers that a client is going to need for a job. For example, if someone is getting ready to sublease a shipping container, they will need just one container. If several tons of materials are needed for a construction job, several containers will likely be required to haul away the building waste. All of these factors must be taken into consideration when one decides how to deliver a significant quantity of materials, and that's why logistics is an important part of the delivery business.

q1.translation: 集装箱运输业务正在蓬勃发展，这意味着需求大于供应。当一个人决定运送一个集装箱的材料时，有很多因素需要考虑，例如需要什么类型的集装箱，材料将如何移动，材料将如何分配，它们是否会被分类，如何等。上下文将决定客户端执行任务所需的容器数量。
q1.front: The container delivery business is booming, which means the demand is higher than the supply. There are a lot of factors to consider when one decides to deliver a container load of materials, such as what type of container is needed, how the materials are going to be moved, how the materials will be distributed, will they be sorted and how, etc. The context will determine the number of containers that a client is going to need for a job.
q1.content: The container delivery business is booming, which ____ the demand is higher ____ the supply. There are a lot of factors to ____ when one decides to deliver a container load of materials, ____ as what type of container is needed, how the materials are going to be moved, how the ____ will be distributed, will ____ be sorted and how, etc. The context will determine the ____ of containers that a client is ____ to need for a job.

q2.translation: 集装箱运输业务正在蓬勃发展，这意味着需求大于供应。当一个人决定运送一个集装箱的材料时，有很多因素需要考虑，例如需要什么类型的集装箱，材料将如何移动，材料将如何分配，它们是否会被分类，如何等。上下文将决定客户端执行任务所需的容器数量。例如，如果有人准备转租一个集装箱，他们只需要一个集装箱。如果一项建筑工作需要几吨材料，可能需要几个集装箱来运走建筑垃圾。当一个人决定如何交付大量的材料时，必须考虑所有这些因素，这就是为什么物流是配送业务的重要组成部分。
q2.front: The container delivery business is booming, which means the demand is higher than the supply. There are a lot of factors to consider when one decides to deliver a container load of materials, such as what type of container is needed, how the materials are going to be moved, how the materials will be distributed, will they be sorted and how, etc. The context will determine the number of containers that a client is going to need for a job.
q2.middle: For example, if someone is getting ready to sublease a shipping container, they will need just one container.
q2.ending: If several tons of materials are needed for a construction job, several containers will likely be required to haul away the building waste. All of these factors must be taken into consideration when one decides how to deliver a significant quantity of materials, and that's why logistics is an important part of the delivery business.

options.sentence: The dump truck driver offered to take the container if the container driver wouldn't take the dump truck.
There are over ocean freight movements every day, and most of them rely on containers for shipping goods.
Other companies have special routes in which they deliver containers to locations where they are needed.
For example, if someone is getting ready to sublease a shipping container, they will need just one container.

options.sentence: There are many factors to consider when deciding how to deliver a container of load of materials.
Truck drivers are always competing with each other to pick up the most packages or deliver the most products.
Companies will often have multiple trucks to deliver containers in case one is unavailable.
Large companies prefer using their own trucks to deliver containers, but this is not practical for small companies.
